Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have now added the Eagle-1 SSTO

and my new mini stock bearing and example craft.

Thanks!

MJ

(Edited, said something before that doesn't apply)

This is quite the collection of great stuff! Currently looking at your bearing, and do you mind if I post a project that I use it in as long as I credit you?

Thanks

Edited February 15, 2015 by 1Revenger1
how do I get an ssto to orbit?

(Edited, said something before that doesn't apply)

This is quite the collection of great stuff! Currently looking at your bearing, and do you mind if I post a project that I use it in as long as I credit you?

Thanks

That's all I ask. You can do whatever you want with it.

how do I get an ssto to orbit?

That's a tricky question as it depends on the SSTO in question. Do you have one in mind?
Woah, we're not partners yet Might we rectify that?
Amazing works MJ! Maybe some of the best i've ever seen in stock game

Amazing works MJ! Maybe some of the best i've ever seen in stock game

Thank you very much Daze! I put a hell of a lot of work into my craft. They have inspired many and that fills me with gooey happiness.

Some of the rockets and such may have been broken by updates though.. I am putting all my KSP time into the rebuild of my constellation mission so they may not get updated for a while.

Edited March 22, 2015 by Majorjim

Thank you very much Daze! I put a hell of a lot of work into my craft. They have inspired many and that fills me with gooey happiness.

Some of the rockets and such may have been broken by updates though.. I am putting all my KSP time into the rebuild of my constellation mission so they may not get updated for a while.

If the results is at least the 20% of the old one TAKE YOUR TIME and don't worry

If the results is at least the 20% of the old one TAKE YOUR TIME and don't worry

The landers are more true to the proposed real life ones than mods I've seen made to do exactly that! And I will, yes it will take a few months. Not least because I have to wait for 1.0...
Omg their all so good I dint think ksp could handle all of the epicness

Omg their all so good I dint think ksp could handle all of the epicness

LOL cheers matey! It can handle a lot moar!

LOL cheers matey! It can handle a lot moar!

You know you have your inbox full, right?

You know you have your inbox full, right?

I do now thanks mate. I never was very good at house keeping..

Edited March 26, 2015 by Majorjim
Any new craft for 1.0?

Any new craft for 1.0?

Hey, funny you should ask! I am going to post pics of a craft from my constellation rebuild pack today.

That's all I'm working on at the moment, the constellation pack I mean. Just waiting for some fairing improvements and performance increases. V1.0... Has much poorer performance compared to v0.90.

Hey, funny you should ask! I am going to post pics of a craft from my constellation rebuild pack today.

That's all I'm working on at the moment, the constellation pack I mean. Just waiting for some fairing improvements and performance increases. V1.0... Has much poorer performance compared to v0.90.

OMG! The pictures, I can't wait

OMG! The pictures, I can't wait

LOL, don't get too excited. It isn't one of the landers. As they are functional so to show them wouldn't do them justice unless I show everything. So they will come later.

Last time I forgot to add the Altair Moon part of the proposed Constellation program. So I made an Altair lander replica which will launch atop the same Ares V launcher as the Mars vehicles.

That's what I'm gunna show, the Altair lander (its a good one) Just need to eat.

LOL, don't get too excited. It isn't one of the landers. As they are functional so to show them wouldn't do them justice unless I show everything. So they will come later.

Last time I forgot to add the Altair Moon part of the proposed Constellation program. So I made an Altair lander replica which will launch atop the same Ares V launcher as the Mars vehicles.

That's what I'm gunna show, the Altair lander (its a good one) Just need to eat.

Here is the post with pics: CLICK
Woah! That altair lander looks pretty cool. Cant wait intill I get my little green kerbal hands on them

Wow, how could I have I missed this?

Would you like to be partners with AMRSD?

Wow, how could I have I missed this?

Would you like to be partners with AMRSD?

Hey man, lol no problem I am quite 'low key'. I like it that way. I make all these crafts for myself mainly.

I know when I've made something cool and I share it because I know it will give others pleasure.

Um, yeah sure I will add you. MJ

edit, done.

Edited June 14, 2015 by Majorjim
done

I updated the Curiosity rover.

Cheers!
Thanks for helping with the Ares 1, is it OK if I pinch your Ares V for The Dunatian pack?

Thanks for helping with the Ares 1, is it OK if I pinch your Ares V for The Dunatian pack?

Help your self mate. Let me know if you need anything else.

Cheers. MJ

MJ, is the X-37 working in 1.04?

EDIT:Whoops, never mind, my laptop cannot handle 800 parts, i'll be sticking with my horrible square-ish X37.
